recipesJson.name: Black #1
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: No nonsense aromatic tobacco @Maxsavage suggested trying Native tobacco solo and it's awesome just additional layers to the mix.I have used Native tobacco before in a mix but I think I hid the natural beauty of this flavor with to many heavy creams and flavors I could vape this in a nice MTL device and be content...
